alert.note: Alert for DuPage (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:40PM CDT until July 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL DUPAGE COUNTY... At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lisle, or over Wheaton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. Half dollar size hail in Warrenville. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wheaton, Downers Grove, Lombard, Carol Stream, Glendale Heights, Woodridge, Glen Ellyn, West Chicago, Westmont, Lisle, Darien, Warrenville and Winfield. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
